text: Uye murume aitenda kubva mumhuri yaFarawo akaviga kutenda kwake akati: “Munouraya murume here nekuti ati: Tenzi vangu ndi Allah, uye zvirokwazvo auya kwamuri nezviratidzo zviri pachena kubva kuna Tenzi venyu? Uye kana ari munyepi, kwaari anenge aine chitadzo chekunyepa kwake; asi kana achitaura chokwadi mamwe matambudziko ari kukuvimbisai achava anokuwirai.” Zvirokwazvo, Allah havatungamiriri muMusrif (mudzvinyiriri, mhondi, mutadzi), munyepi
